definition: to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross

sentences.english: Have you noticed simultaneous translation at the press conference?
sentences.chinese: 你注意到了记者招待会上的同声翻译吗？

sentences.english: To interpret simultaneously is extremely difficult.
If you need simultaneous interpreters pls contact me, Shelly.
sentences.chinese: 如需同声翻译，请联系我。

sentences.english: The advanced level test certificate holders will be qualified to do simultaneous interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 高级翻译资格证书的获得者能够胜任同声翻译工作。

sentences.english: The Roundtable is bilingual in Chinese and English and simultaneous interpretation will be available.
sentences.chinese: 本次圆桌论坛将使用中英双语并提供同声翻译。

sentences.english: Simultaneous Interpretation is provided at Shanghai &Shenzhen Customer Summits .
sentences.chinese: 本次上海与深圳大会提供同声翻译服务。

sentences.english: Parallel interpretation provided for day 1 morning and day 2 afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 第一天上午和第二天下午有同声翻译。

sentences.english: Third-year students begin to practise simultaneous interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 三年级学生开始练习同声翻译。

sentences.english: At our policy meetings we also have had simultaneous interpretation available.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的政策会议中，我们也提供同声翻译。

definition: simultaneous interpretation (abbr. for 同聲傳譯|同声传译[tong2 sheng1 chuan2 yi4])
Korean language (esp. in context of South Korea)
